item.content:encoded: Image: Mike Klubnika Buckshot Roulette is $1.20 on Itch There are a few games that are so unusual and incredible that I wish I could erase my memory and play them again for the first time. While I haven‚Äôt figured out a way to achieve that goal, there‚Äôs a fun alternative ‚Äî find projects inspired by those games, and appreciate them. Buckshot Roulette, a game made by Mike Klubnika, is a perfect example of this. Buckshot Roulette is a stark and simple horror game that lasts about 15-20 minutes. De...

item.content:encoded: Photo: Liane Hentscher/HBO The Last of Us Part 2‚Äôs story could take more than a season, but who knows when it might start The Last of Us‚Äô first season has come to an end, but there‚Äôs more to Joel and Ellie‚Äôs story than one season of TV could tell. item.title: How Multimodality Makes LLM Alignment More Challenging | KDnuggets
item.description: The addition of multimodal abilities to ChatGPT via GPT-4 allows users to use images and text together, expanding its functions but posing new challenges. Aligning this mix of data demands careful cur...
item.content:encoded: The addition of multimodal abilities to ChatGPT via GPT-4 allows users to use images and text together, expanding its functions but posing new challenges. Aligning this mix of data demands careful curation and presents ethical considerations, requiring developers to obtain high-quality training data and navigate complex issues for ethical alignment.
